description:
I really don't know much about Adam.
He does not have transportation, so I went and got him. We met at a central location, and then when I returned him it was quite a drive from where the studio is located.
So, we had a lot of time in the car, but he was on his phone a lot, and I only managed to get a few details from him. I was pretty much a ride share driver. Which is his primary form of transportation, so understandable.
He is a Texas boy, and is into men. He likes hiking, working out, and Rupaul's Drag Race.
Adam is versatile, but definitely more of Bottom. And you can tell in his fantastic solo that he is wanting you to come play with his ass.
Surprisingly, for a Bottom, he likes to cum upright. So, he shot his load up on his knees. He drops forward for only a moment (I had warned him that dropping forward was the one issue with this type of cum shot) but he quickly corrected.
He dumps a nice tidy load on the towel I put down, and he has quite the aim.
title: Adam Gomez - Solo
